description: Add role to multiple users or groups in a private re:Post.

parameters.name: accessorIds
parameters.description: The user or group accessor identifiers to add the role to. (string) ---

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role to add to the users or groups.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: addedAccessorIds
nested_items.description: An array of successfully updated accessor identifiers.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: An array of errors that occurred when roles were added.

nested_items.name: accessorId
nested_items.description: The accessor identifier that's related to the error.
